column2: An agent of Scoia'tael has managed to get in contact with you. He asks you to support the Scoia'tael to free the non-humans under the oppressive rule of human lordlings.
I can support them in secret.
There have been reports from [Root.GetName] about presence of Scoia'tael.
Damn freaks! They all should be executed.
The Scoia'tael presence in the realm have been left unchecked for too long, they have managed to spread their operations to[Root.GetName].
Damn freaks! They all should be executed.
There have been disconcerning news from [Root.GetName] - not only are there Scoia'tael in the area, but also local populace are secretly supporting them with weapons and provisions.
Damn traitors! They should be executed together with non-human scum.
To the honorable [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. We humbly ask that you accept our oath of fealty as our new liege.\n\n[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
No, I don't want to be associated with Scoia'tael.
